text:
The provisions of Sections 
10.21 to 
10.24 of this Code shall not apply to claims referred to the Bureau of Delinquent Revenue Collection, pursuant to the provisions of Sections 
10.37 to 
10.42 of this Code. 
(Ord. No. 8346(1939), Sec. 5; amended by Ord. 314-00, File No. 001909, App. 12/28/2000)
